title.label: Title
title.helpBoxText: If applying for funding, state the name exactly as in the grant proposal.

description.label: Description
description.helpBoxText: Briefly summarise the type of study (or studies), the research questions being addressed and the purpose of any data being collected or created to help others understand the purposes for which the data are being collected or created.

fieldOfResearch.label: Field of research
fieldOfResearch.placeholder: Input research area and hit enter
fieldOfResearch.helpBoxText: Try and be specific as possible. If your field is not in the list, that doesn't surprise me.

ethicsRequired.label: Ethical approval required
ethicsRequired.helpBoxText: Do you need to obtain ethical consent for this project?

iwiConsultationRequired.label: Iwi consultation required
iwiConsultationRequired.helpBoxText: Do you need consultation in order to maintain cultural sensitivity?

document.cardsubheading: Attach and summarise any documents that you feel will be useful in understanding your data management plan. This might include ethical approval, iwi consultation, metadata standards, or anything really.
document.label: Document

summary.label: Summary
summary.helpBoxText: Please summarise the contents of this document.

contributor.cardsubheading: Add the details of people who contribute to the project. This might include University of Auckland staff, students, or external collaborators.
contributor.label: Contributor

role.label: Role
role.helpBoxText: What does this person do in the project?

affiliation.label: Affiliation
affiliation.helpBoxText: What organisation is this person affiliated with?

username.label: University of Auckland Username
username.helpBoxText: The contributor's unique University of Auckland username (e.g. ssam012), leave blank if not applicable.

orcid.label: ORCiD link
orcid.helpBoxText: The contributor's ORCiD, can be found at ORCiD.com or something.
